channel.title: Simple reminder
channel.description: i know i've repeatedly asked about mitb to post the worlds of C and W2 of the last map, and i do not mean to be bothersome in any way, but after months of waiting, and it still hasnt been posted, i would like to remind mitb/whoever about it so it may hopefully get done. thanks for your time. I would also think the W2 map isnt that large and is able to be compressed enough for either online-download, or be distributed in peices (take some chunks of files from the main folder and distribute it in seperate parts to meet size requirments, and the recepient assemble them again within a folder after they obtain them. very simple).

item.title: Simple reminder
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Nice one Matty

As for the downloads, I’d say just forget about it for now, when you least expect it I’m sure it will happen. Or maybe not, I’m no fortune teller.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple reminder
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

I support the downloading of world 2 for non instructive purposes and purposeful harm to all outsiders, stay golden ponyboy, dallas was a good guy, sodapop was a little man whore, and johnny cakes stabbed that dude in the back to protect his friend. Did he go a little to far? Yes, was it necessary, absolutely.
